com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface TestRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BuildRule, Comparable<BuildRule>, HasBuildTarget
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExternalTestRunnerRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidInstrumentationTest, AppleTest, CxxBoostTest, CxxGtestTest, CxxTest, DTest, GoTest, JavaTest, KotlinTest, PythonTest, RobolectricTest, RustTest, ShTest

    public interface TestRule
extends HasBuildTarget, BuildRule
    A BuildRule that is designed to run tests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TestRule.TestReportingCallback
      Callbacks to invoke during the test run to report information about test cases and/or tests.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static TestRule.TestReportingCallback NOOP_REPORTING_CALLBACK
      Implementation of TestRule.TestReportingCallback which does nothing.

      • Fields inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.model.HasBuildTarget

        BUILD_TARGET_COMPARATOR

    • Field Detail

      • NOOP_REPORTING_CALLBACK

        static final TestRule.TestReportingCallback NOOP_REPORTING_CALLBACK
        Implementation of TestRule.TestReportingCallback which does nothing.

    • Method Detail

      • hasTestResultFiles

        boolean hasTestResultFiles()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the files that contain the test results for this rule are present.

        If this method returns true, then interpretTestResults(ExecutionContext, boolean) should be able to be called directly.

      • runTests

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Step> runTests(ExecutionContext executionContext,
                                                       TestRunningOptions options,
                                                       TestRule.TestReportingCallback testReportingCallback)
        Returns the commands required to run the tests.

        Note: This method may be run without BuildEngine.build(BuildEngineBuildContext, ExecutionContext, BuildRule) having been run. This happens if the user has built [and ran] the test previously and then re-runs it using the --debug flag.

        Parameters:
        executionContext - Provides context for creating Steps.
        options - The runtime testing options.
        Returns:
        the commands required to run the tests

      • interpretTestResults

        Callable<TestResults> interpretTestResults(ExecutionContext executionContext,
                                           boolean isUsingTestSelectors)

      • getLabels

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<Label> getLabels()
        Returns:
        The set of labels for this build rule.

      • getContacts

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> getContacts()
        Returns:
        The set of email addresses to act as contact points for this test.

      • getPathToTestOutputDirectory

        Path getPathToTestOutputDirectory()
        Returns:
        The relative path to the output directory of the test rule.

      • runTestSeparately

        boolean runTestSeparately()
        Returns:
        true if the test should run by itself when no other tests are run, false otherwise.

      • supportsStreamingTests

        boolean supportsStreamingTests()
        Returns:
        true if calling runTests() on this rule invokes the callbacks in testReportingCallback as the tests run, false otherwise.
